question.body: For which group are we making a hypothesis?

multiple_choice.choice: the population of community college students
the population of community college students in California
a sample of community college students in California

response.feedback: Incorrect. We do not need to make a hypothesis about community college students. For this population, we already know that 23% receive federal grants.
Correct. We are trying to answer a question about California community college students.
Incorrect. We do not need to make a hypothesis about a sample. We can always calculate the proportion using the sample data.
